CustomField.description: The start date of the Tax Year based on the Pay Update Date
CustomField.formula: If ( MONTH ( tc9_eau__Pay_Update_Date__c ) > 6 , DATE ( YEAR ( tc9_eau__Pay_Update_Date__c) , 7 , 1 ) , DATE ( YEAR ( tc9_eau__Pay_Update_Date__c ) -1 , 7 , 1 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The start date of the Tax Year based on the Pay Update Date
CustomField.label: Tax Year Start Date
